item.title: My Stick RPG *C* Scripts
item.dc:creator: @Do0mz Do0mz
item.description:
@Do0mz wrote:

All these scripts where made by me

Sleeper

[code]{–Created By Do0mz–}
{–This script will sleep over and over giving you money in the bank–}
{–You MUST start with money in your bank or this will be pointless–}

program New;
procedure sleep;
begin
ClickMouse(224,183, true);
wait(500);
ClickMouse(492,264, true);
end;

begin
repeat
sleep
until(false)
end.[/code]

News Watcher

[code]{–Created By Do0mz–}
{–This script will watch the news 11 times and then sleep
giving you intelegence, it will repeat over and over–}

program New;

Const
Waittime = 1000;// MAx time of gaps between movements (too fast can fuck it).

procedure news;
begin
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(389,139, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(297,144, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(497,291, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(217,193, true);
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(478,263, true);
end;

begin
repeat
news
until(false)
end.[/code]

Gambler

[code]{–Created By Do0mz–}
{–It takes ages setting 1million for your bid in the casino so this will do it
for you–}

program New;

Const
Waittime = 10;// How often you want to click (10 is perfect).

procedure gamble;
begin
ClickMouse(126,244, true);//change it to the position of the number
wait(waittime);
ClickMouse(126,244, true);//set the same as the other one
end;

begin
repeat
gamble
until(false)
end.[/code]
